discussion.content:
ACD
Forecast quantity for Opportunity product

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks (CK) has recently implemented Sales Cloud. CK wants to be able to forecast the number of shoes it sells to better coordinate with the logistics department to fulfill orders.

Which three options should a consultant recommend CK implement to accomplish this? (Choose three.)

Cloud Kicks (CK) uses Territory Management to assign accounts to sales reps. There are several high-value accounts in New York City that must always remain with the same sales rep after territory assignment rules are run.

What should a consultant recommend CK Implement to allow the high-value assignments to remain and allow the rest of the assignments to be made?

A consultant for Universal Containers is preparing to migrate the company's legacy CRM to Salesforce. The admin for the previous system is enthusiastic about Salesforce and driving the objectives of the implementation, but end users have expressed dissatisfaction about moving to a new platform.

What are two ways the consultant can determine and validate their approach with end users? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Should be B & D. Don't validate plans with end users (C)

comments.content: yes, I think C is a terrible idea.

choices.D: Enlist the help of a champion to ensure that Salesforce is meeting end user needs.
choices.B: Interview top-level executives to understand the KPIs for end users.
choices.A: Conduct a technical review with developers to evaluate solutions designed for end users.
choices.C: Validate the solution plans and implementation with end users.

questions.question_text: When emails are synched into Salesforce by Einstein Activity Capture, how are the emails matched to Salesforce Lead and Contact record data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is it

comments.content: you should stop confusing people, give reasons not assumptions

choices.A: Matching is based on standard Email and custom fields with a type of Email.
choices.B: Matching is based on the standard Email field.
choices.D: Matching is based on First Name, Last Name and the standard Email fields.
choices.C: Matching is based on Last Name and the standard Email fields.

questions.question_text:
A consultant is beginning a new project with Cloud Kicks to implement Collaborative Forecasting.

What should the consultant use to gather requirements using an Agile methodology?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is it
